titleStmt.title: SII 13.324: original edition by G.V. Srinivasa Rao
No. 324. (A.R. No. 15 of 1920.) ON THE WEST WALL OF THE SAME SHRINE.

summary.p: This records an endowment of 3(1/2) mā of land after purchasing it tax-free from the assembly (peruṅguṟi-sabhai) of Māṟpiḍugu-chaturvēdimaṅgalam by Nakkaṉ Śiṅgaṉ the headman of Puriśai in Parivaṇḍattuṟai, the eastern division of Ārkāṭṭukūṟṟam, for burning a perpetual lamp in the temple of Maḻapāḍi-Mahādēva. The high regnal year of the king suggests that the inscription might be one of Āditya I.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . kovirājakecaripanmarkku yāṇṭu 2 10 7Āvatu Ārkkāṭṭukkūṟṟattu kiḻpirivilparivaṇṭattuṟai paricaikiḻāṉ nakkan ciṅka�
hmateyam māṟpiṭukucaturvedimaṅkalattu peruṅkuṟisabhaiyāriṭai nān vilaikoṇṭu Uṭaiya bhūmi śrīmatierikkiḻ neṭuvālantattu pu
ya nān kalli macakki koḷvatāna Iṟaiyili nilattukku Ellai kiḻpāṟkkellai koṭun=tāḷmunṟumāvil melvarampukku meṟkkum tenpāṟk
tukku vaṭakkum melpāṟkellai kiḻattimayakkalil kiḻvarampukku kiḻakku vaṭapāṟkellai parameśvaravāykkālukku teṟkkum I
nānkellaiyuḷ Akappaṭṭa nilam mummāvaraiyum māṟappiṭuku caturvetimaṅkalattu sabhaiyā- riṭai nān Iṟaiyiliyāka vilaikoṇṭu
maḻapāṭi mahādevarkku Oru non=tāviḷakku Erippatāka Aṭṭikkuṭutten puricaikiḻān nakkan ciṅkanen Itu can=tirātittaval panmāheśvararakṣai .
Digital edition of SII 13.324 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
